Reviews.Title: not happy at all
Reviews.Author: Tina Rivera
Reviews.Content: this phone is nice but only if you going to use it with at&t; sim card. I have tmobile you cant sent or recieve pictures messages. you cant use the apps. the phone has slow response. I bought two of these phone one I had the prodlem i listed before and the another never turn on the battery didt work. very upset with this product.

Reviews.Title: Caution!
Reviews.Author: MSJ
Reviews.Content: The item purchased is fine - not great but does what it says it will do - however I do caution you with dealing with this seller OEM Shop.  They use trite, standard comments regarding customer service, but fail to read previous emails, blatantly lied in one email about method of shipping, to sum it up - one of the most frustrating experiences I have ever had with and Amazon associate - use caution with dealing with this company!

Reviews.Title: bluetooth
Reviews.Author: terrific
Reviews.Content: Good phone but the bluetooth is no good never worked would not connect to any deviceQuickfire GTX 75 Unlocked GSM Cell Phone

Reviews.Title: Quickfire Cel Phone
Reviews.Author: cece
Reviews.Content: i like the phone it works great the only thing i don't like about the phone is that you cant use your Bluetooth to transfer files beside that its a great phone

Reviews.Title: Not a good phone
Reviews.Author: Not Happy
Reviews.Content: Just not happy with how this phone works. Very slow, and all of the functions do not work.Brand New Unlocked GSM Quickfire Phone, GTX75G (Green)

Reviews.Title: not satisfied
Reviews.Author: zoe
Reviews.Content: Although the phone was brand new and came on time it was not unlocked and I couldn't use it because no one could unlock it. If you have a code to o so i would really appreciate it.

Reviews.Title: Quickfire
Reviews.Author: ladyjol
Reviews.Content: The phone works as it should. The phone is very good with holding a charge I only charge it once a week, and leave it on 24/7. I have had no problems with charging it.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: JoshR
Reviews.Content: I just got my phone today. It was a very fast shipping. And the phone is perfect, no problems, it came brand new with wrappers on everything. So I recommend this phone.

Reviews.Title: neat
Reviews.Author: seven
Reviews.Content: The phone was nice except for the charging port. I took it to ATT and was told that this phone was bagged for that reason. It's life at the carrier was short lived.

Reviews.Title: Unhappy
Reviews.Author: Vicki
Reviews.Content: Well when I received this the screen was damaged and I had to buy another new phone and there was phone numbers and text messages on the phone from someone else that use to own the phone and it was suppose to be a brand new phone. I was very upset that I spent $70.00 for a used broken phone.

Reviews.Title: Looks Good BUT DOES NOT WORK GOOD
Reviews.Author: Whitique
Reviews.Content: The touchscreen is EXTREMELY hard to use. I keep pressing and most times it does not work. The phone looks good and when turned on the screen looks great, but what good is a phone if it does not work when you try to use the touchscreen. I bought this phone to upgrade but had to go with my old phone.

Reviews.Title: Very BAD CHOICE ON MY PART!!
Reviews.Author: Clarissa R Jones
Reviews.Content: This was not the kind of phone I thought I was buying its to old for all of the things you in this time and age as far as communication.

Reviews.Title: OK.
Reviews.Author: Irene V.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my grandson and he likes it. It's a pretty basic phone and sometimes the touch screen stalls out and won't do anything.

Reviews.Title: it was a great value..
Reviews.Author: nicole simonson
Reviews.Content: i got it for my mom. she likes it alot and easy to use. the reception isnt alway the greatest and i have the same company and will have reception and she wont. so beyound that i would recommened it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: herbert walker
Reviews.Content: It holds up to a pre-teen child that throws it around with toys and stuff like that and works great.

Reviews.Title: This is a Great phone
Reviews.Author: Melody
Reviews.Content: This is my duaghters second quickfire. She loves it and has refused all the offers to upgrade to a newer and different model. If you like touch screens, this is the phone for you.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: FL Girl
Reviews.Content: Bought as a gift. The friend for whom I bought the phone says it was a welcomed device easily learnable. We were Both Glad it did not come in the Lime Green it was advertised in!!!

Reviews.Title: Too Bulky
Reviews.Author: Imjustme
Reviews.Content: Phone was crap! It was very slow and extra bulky! Sending it back, even though I just got it yesterday.

Reviews.Title: Cartoon Phone
Reviews.Author: Victoria Banuelos
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately this phone is not what I wanted. I am not happy with its asthetics.I am keeping it only for emergency purposes because it does work with my service.

Reviews.Title: This phone is defective
Reviews.Author: Clint
Reviews.Content: I got this phone for my girlfriend because her old one was just old & wore out. She had it for 3 years. My point is , she takes good care of her phones for 1 to last 3 years. Anyhow, So we received this new shiny green phone in the mail and powered it on and it worked great for about a week. Then it started giving her some problems with the touch screen. By week two, We couldn't get the screen to work at all. It is going out in tomorrow's mail for return. Lucky it started to malfunction within the 30 day return policy. I wouldn't recommend this product to anyone.

Reviews.Title: quicfkfire GTX75G
Reviews.Author: J. Davis "satisfied customer"
Reviews.Content: this phone is great and it works very well and I am very happy with it. I would replace it with another quickfire if something happened to this one.

Reviews.Title: Phone review
Reviews.Author: Mark K. Taylor
Reviews.Content: This is an older phone, I knew that going in.  My teenage daughter loves it.  Great for texting which is what teens do primarily.  She lost her first phone, got this as a value replacement and she likes this better than the first one.  I'm not buying an expensive one for kid to trash and this does the job a a great price and she loves it.  Win win.

Reviews.Title: Lied To
Reviews.Author: weidong bai
Reviews.Content: I purchased this phone for my daughter under the notion that it was BRAND NEW, like the product description had clearly stated. Everything was going pretty well with this phone. It was rather bulky, but my daughter didn't mind too much. The battery life faltered. That's when I was suspicious that this phone clearly was not a great one. But a new battery is inexpensive to purchase, and my daughter liked this phone. Then, she went to the Text Templates on her cell phone. Tell me, does any AT&T; cell phone have "Hell no" and "Hell yes" as a text template? NO. This phone was clearly used before. Overall, this phone is pretty good for its suitable price. But being lied to--I'm not very happy with that.

Reviews.Title: Ehh
Reviews.Author: Lindsay
Reviews.Content: Nice looking phone, but works horribly. Touch screen was the big turn off and did not work at all. I became frustrated within two days of using this phone and had to get a different one.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: winne the pooh
Reviews.Content: this phone is amazing. my old one was being a huge jerk to me, so i bought this one and was very pleased. it is everything i have ever wanted!! thank you!!

Reviews.Title: This phone sucks.
Reviews.Author: Brittany Elaine
Reviews.Content: The touch screen is so messed up it takes you forever to get where you want it to go. It shuts off randomly, you cant turn the predictive text off, and im stuck with it because i cant afford a new phone. worst money spent. the only upside to this phone is its a great stress reliever, ive thrown it at the floor full force and hasn't got a scratch.

Reviews.Title: att quick fire phone
Reviews.Author: Sarah E. Ford
Reviews.Content: if i wanted a cell phone that did not work unless plugged into the wall i would have bought a corded home phone. it really sucks to but something in good faith then have to turn around, go out and buy the battery needed to run the device. at an additional cost

Reviews.Title: Misrepresented item!
Reviews.Author: misswood
Reviews.Content: The item came and looks great.  I ordered two, both said they were green, only one was.  One came with a chewed up car charger.  All this I over looked, but now only 3 months later the phone battery in both phones, don't even last a day.  I barely use my phone, it just doesn't hold it's power.  I really think I got a used phone that said it was brand new.

Reviews.Title: decent phone
Reviews.Author: Jennifer
Reviews.Content: my cousin asked me to order this phone for her because she loves these phones, unfortunately she dropped it after she got it and broke the charging port =/

Reviews.Title: unhappy
Reviews.Author: crickett
Reviews.Content: 1 of my phones are messed up and 1 phone the battery was bad.I've contacted the seller regarding the issue and they tell me to contact amazon.Amazon says it's only egible for a refund. I don't want a refund as I bought thesephones for my kids . If they will only refund it then I'll send all 5 back.Other than that the phones came at a decent time , and were priced good.And the otherphones work good.

Reviews.Title: Dont get this phone
Reviews.Author: blake
Reviews.Content: This phone is not the easiest to use. The touch screen does not work well on it. I have already bought another phone to replace this one.

Reviews.Title: Highly Upset!
Reviews.Author: Sheryl Campbell
Reviews.Content: The touch screen doesnt work! i called the number that came with the package and its not a working number! Ended up buying another phone, bc this one was frustrating to deal with! After calling a billion times, i sent an email, and thats when someone finally responded, hopefully i get a refund! Not pleased at all!!!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Phone
Reviews.Author: Technical Expert
Reviews.Content: It's a very good phone. Some options do not work because people do not know how to use it or they do not have such a service. That's all!

Reviews.Title: cell phone quick fire
Reviews.Author: julio cesar
Reviews.Content: soy de venezuela y compre este telefono para mi por lo varato que estaba no me gustaba mucho pero cuando llego aqui a venezuela me enamore total mente de el es buenisimo tiene pantalla tactil con cualquier chip de linea sirve es fino lo malo es que no trae nada osea el cargador y mas nada ya yo voy para un mes co el y no precenta ningun problema yo lo recomiendo 100% si estan dudando lo lo dude muche y comprelo que no va a perder su dinero

Reviews.Title: utstarcom quickfire
Reviews.Author: Carrie Shindorf
Reviews.Content: this is a great phone all the review about it are more then wrong about it. its a very good phone for all things and battery is great too

Reviews.Title: iS THE WORST!
Reviews.Author: Lizeth Orozco B "lizz"
Reviews.Content: Gentlemen this telephone is very tuna by outside but on the inside he is the worse thing you accustom does not serve its screen to him and usb does not serve blutetooth nor the cable. Music, images, etc. cannot be put him nor. THEY DO NOT BUY IT
